info.name: Medicine Delivery API
info.description: Complete API collection for Medicine Delivery Application

request.description: Login with admin credentials. Token will be automatically saved to collection variable.
Creates admin user: Mobile: 8793583675, Email: dipmala.patil@medicine.com, Password: Admin@123
Creates admin user: Mobile: 9999999999, Email: admin@medicine.com, Password: Admin@123
Creates manager user: Mobile: 8888888888, Email: manager@medicine.com, Password: Manager@123
Creates customer support user: Mobile: 7777777777, Email: support@medicine.com, Password: Support@123
Creates customer user: Mobile: 6666666666, Email: customer@medicine.com, Password: Customer@123
Creates chemist user: Mobile: 5555555555, Email: chemist@medicine.com, Password: Chemist@123
Get all orders belonging to a specific customer. Example customerId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001

item.name: Get Active Orders By Medical Store ID

exec: pm.test("All orders are not Completed", function () {

request.description: Get all active orders (status != Completed) for a medical store. Example medicalStoreId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001
Accept an order (only if status is AssignedToChemist). Requires order with status 'AssignedToChemist'
Reject an order with a note (only if status is AssignedToChemist). Requires order with status 'AssignedToChemist'

formdata.description: Required: Customer Address GUID (must have Latitude and Longitude for nearest store assignment)
Optional: Required if OrderInputType is Text (0)
Optional: Required if OrderInputType is Image (1) or Voice (2)

request.description: Create a new order. OrderInputText is required for Text orders, OrderInputFile is required for Image/Voice orders. OrderNumber and OTP are auto-generated. Nearest medical store is assigned if customer address has coordinates.

item.name: Get Active Orders By Customer ID

exec: pm.test("All orders are not Completed", function () {

request.description: Get all active orders (status != Completed) belonging to a specific customer. Example customerId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001

item.name: Get Accepted Orders By Medical Store ID

exec: pm.test("All orders have AcceptedByChemist status", function () {

request.description: Get all orders with status 'AcceptedByChemist' for a medical store. Example medicalStoreId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001

item.name: Get Rejected Orders By Medical Store ID

exec: pm.test("All orders have RejectedByChemist status", function () {

request.description: Get all orders with status 'RejectedByChemist' for a medical store. Example medicalStoreId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001

item.name: Get All Orders By Medical Store ID

exec: pm.test("All orders belong to the medical store", function () {

request.description: Get all orders (any status) belonging to a medical store. Example medicalStoreId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001

exec: pm.test("Order is assigned to medical store", function () {

request.description: Assign an order to a medical store using order number. Order status will be set to 'AssignedToChemist'. Requires valid orderNumber and medicalStoreId.
Complete an order by verifying OTP. Order must be in 'OutForDelivery' status. OTP must match the order's OTP. Use orderOtp variable from Create Order response.
Get all orders. Requires ListAllOrders permission.

formdata.description: Required: PDF file for order bill

request.description: Upload order bill (PDF) and set order amount. Updates OrderBillFileLocation and TotalAmount in the order.
Assign order to delivery. Updates order status to OutForDelivery and creates assignment history. Order must be in BillUploaded or Paid status.
Create a user with a specific role. Optional fields: phoneNumber (default: null), emailConfirmed (default: false), isActive (default: true)
Register a new user (Customer role). Optional fields: phoneNumber
Register a new customer. Optional fields: customerMiddleName, alternativeMobileNumber, emailId, gender, addresses
Create a new customer. Optional fields: customerMiddleName, alternativeMobileNumber, emailId, gender, customerPhoto, userId, addresses
Update customer information. Optional fields: customerMiddleName, alternativeMobileNumber, emailId, gender, customerPhoto, addresses

item.name: Get Default Address By Customer ID

body.raw:
{
  "customerId": "{{customerId}}",
  "address": "123 Main Street, Apt 4B, Near Park",
  "addressLine1": "123 Main Street",
  "addressLine2": "Apt 4B",
  "addressLine3": "Near Park",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "state": "Maharashtra",
  "postalCode": "400001",
  "latitude": 19.0760,
  "longitude": 72.8777,
  "isDefault": true
}

request.description: Create a new customer address. All address fields are optional except customerId. Latitude and Longitude are optional but required for nearest medical store assignment when creating orders. Example coordinates: Mumbai (19.0760, 72.8777), Delhi (28.6139, 77.2090), Bangalore (12.9716, 77.5946)

body.raw:
{
  "address": "123 Main Street, Apt 4B, Near Park",
  "addressLine1": "123 Main Street",
  "addressLine2": "Apt 4B",
  "addressLine3": "Near Park",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "state": "Maharashtra",
  "postalCode": "400001",
  "latitude": 19.0760,
  "longitude": 72.8777,
  "isDefault": true,
  "isActive": true
}

request.description: Update customer address. All fields are optional. Latitude and Longitude can be updated. Example coordinates: Mumbai (19.0760, 72.8777), Delhi (28.6139, 77.2090), Bangalore (12.9716, 77.5946)

body.raw:
{
  "medicalName": "ABC Medical Store",
  "ownerFirstName": "Raj",
  "ownerLastName": "Sharma",
  "ownerMiddleName": "Kumar",
  "addressLine1": "123 Medical Street",
  "addressLine2": "Near Hospital",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "state": "Maharashtra",
  "postalCode": "400001",
  "latitude": 19.0760,
  "longitude": 72.8777,
  "mobileNumber": "1234567890",
  "emailId": "store@example.com",
  "alternativeMobileNumber": "0987654321",
  "registrationStatus": true,
  "gstin": "27AAAAA0000A1Z5",
  "pan": "AAAAA0000A",
  "fssaiNo": "FSSAI123456789",
  "dlNo": "DL123456789",
  "pharmacistFirstName": "Dr. Priya",
  "pharmacistLastName": "Patel",
  "pharmacistRegistrationNumber": "PH123456",
  "pharmacistMobileNumber": "9876543210",
  "password": "Password@123"
}

request.description: Register a new medical store. Optional fields: ownerMiddleName, latitude, longitude, alternativeMobileNumber, gstin

body.raw:
{

request.description: Update medical store information. Optional fields: ownerMiddleName, latitude, longitude, alternativeMobileNumber, gstin
Create a new delivery. All fields are optional except medicalStoreId must be valid if provided.
Get all deliveries (non-deleted).
Get delivery by ID.

item.name: Get Deliveries By Medical Store ID

request.description: Get all deliveries for a medical store.

item.name: Get Active Deliveries By Medical Store ID

request.description: Get active deliveries for a medical store.
Update delivery information. All fields are optional.
Delete delivery (soft delete). Sets IsDeleted to true and IsActive to false.
Create a new customer support region with optional pin codes.
Get all service regions with their pin codes.

item.name: Get Customer Support Region By ID

request.description: Get customer support region by ID with pin codes.
Update customer support region. Providing pinCodes will replace all existing pin codes.
Delete customer support region and all associated pin codes.
Add a pin code to a customer support region.
Remove a pin code from a customer support region.

item.name: Get Pin Codes By Region ID

request.description: Get all pin codes for a customer support region.
Get customer support region by pin code.
Register a new manager. All fields are required for registration.
Register a new customer support. All fields are required for registration.
Update customer support information. Optional fields: isActive
